description.en:
Event raised for invalid field after value was validated but before any action takes effect.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.
Use ui.valid to determine the outcome of the validation.
ui.rule is populated with the name of the rule that failed validation, if any.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event which is raised after error message was hidden.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.target to get reference to the target of the message.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event which is raised before error message is hidden.
Return false in order to keep error message displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.target to get reference to the target of the message.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.target to get reference to the target of the message.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event triggered on Validator instance level after failed validation on form submit event
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form.
description.jp:
Event triggered on Validator instance level after failed validation on form submit event
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form.

description.en:
Event triggered on Validator instance level after successful validation on form submit event
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form.
description.jp:
Event triggered on Validator instance level after successful validation on form submit event
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.

description.en:
Event triggered on Validator instance level before handling a form submit event.
Return false to cancel to skip validating and potentially allow the submit if no other other validators return erros.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form.

Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.target to get reference of the event target form.

Use ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event which is raised after success message was displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.target to get reference to the target of the message.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event which is raised after value was validated but before any action takes effect.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.
Use ui.valid to determine the outcome of the validation.
ui.rule is populated with the name of the rule that failed validation, if any.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.

ui.rule is populated with the name of the rule that failed validation, if any.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en:
Event which is raised on validation before default validation logic is applied.
Return false in order to cancel the event and consider the field valid.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.
description.jp:
Event which is raised on validation before default validation logic is applied.
Return false in order to cancel the event and consider the field valid.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get reference to the igValidator widget.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.
ui.fieldOptions is populated with options for the specific field in the collection or null.

description.en: Gets or sets a custom function to perform validation. Use 'this' to reference the calling validator and the value and optional field settings arguement to determine and return the state of the field.
description.jp: Gets or sets a custom function to perform validation. Use 'this' to reference the calling validator and the value and optional field settings arguement to determine and return the state of the field.

description.en: The function to call
description.jp: The function to call

description.en: Function name, must be in global namespace (window["name"])
description.jp: Function name, must be in global namespace (window["name"])

description.en: A configuration object with method property being the function and optional error message.
description.jp: A configuration object with method property being the function and optional error message.

description.en: Gets or sets option to validate if value is a date. This can help guide the valueRange validation.
description.jp: Gets or sets option to validate if value is a date. This can help guide the valueRange validation.

description.en: A boolean value indicating if the field should be a valid JavaScript Date or can be parsed as one.
description.jp: A boolean value indicating if the field should be a valid JavaScript Date or can be parsed as one.

description.en: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. date: { errorMessage: "Enter a valid number"} )
description.jp: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. date: { errorMessage: "Enter a valid number"} )

description.en: Gets or sets option to validate if value is an email.
description.jp: Gets or sets option to validate if value is an email.

description.en: A boolean value indicating if the field should be an email.
description.jp: A boolean value indicating if the field should be an email.

description.en: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. email: { errorMessage: "Enter a valid email"} )
description.jp: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. email: { errorMessage: "Enter a valid email"} )

description.en: Requires the value in this field to be the same as another input element or editor control.
description.jp: Requires the value in this field to be the same as another input element or editor control.

description.en: A valid jQuery selector for the target element
description.jp: A valid jQuery selector for the target element

description.en: A reference to the jQuery object for the target or an object with selector property and custom errorMessage.
description.jp: A reference to the jQuery object for the target or an object with selector property and custom errorMessage.

description.en: Gets or sets text for error-message which overrides all possible specific error-messages.
description.jp: Gets or sets text for error-message which overrides all possible specific error-messages.

description.en:
List of field items describing each field with validation options and a required selector. Fields can contain any of the validation rules and triggers but not other fields or event handlers.
    Accepted options are also inherited from the global control configuration if not set.
description.jp:
List of field items describing each field with validation options and a required selector. Fields can contain any of the validation rules and triggers but not other fields or event handlers.
    Accepted options are also inherited from the global control configuration if not set.

description.en: Gets or sets minimum and maximum length of text or number of selected items. Null or 0 values are ignored.
description.jp: Gets or sets minimum and maximum length of text or number of selected items. Null or 0 values are ignored.

description.en: An array of two numbers, where the first value is the minimum and the second is the maximum. (e.g. lengthRange: [ 1, 10] )
description.jp: An array of two numbers, where the first value is the minimum and the second is the maximum. (e.g. lengthRange: [ 1, 10] )

description.en: A configuration object with optional error message. Message strings can contain format items for min and max respecitively (e.g. lengthRange: { min: 6, max: 20, errorMessage: "Password must be at least {0} long and no more than {1}." } )
description.jp: A configuration object with optional error message. Message strings can contain format items for min and max respecitively (e.g. lengthRange: { min: 6, max: 20, errorMessage: "Password must be at least {0} long and no more than {1}." } )

description.en: Gets or sets custom jQuery element, which innerHTML will be used to show validation messages. That can be SPAN, LABEL or DIV.
description.jp: Gets or sets custom jQuery element, which innerHTML will be used to show validation messages. That can be SPAN, LABEL or DIV.

description.en: Options for the igNotifier used to show error messages.
description.jp: Options for the igNotifier used to show error messages.

description.en: Gets or sets option to validate if value is a number. Default separators for decimals and thousands are '.' and ',' respectively.
description.jp: Gets or sets option to validate if value is a number. Default separators for decimals and thousands are '.' and ',' respectively.

description.en: A boolean value indicating if the field should be a number.
description.jp: A boolean value indicating if the field should be a number.

description.en: A configuration object with errorMessage, decimalSeparator and thousandsSeparator. Those properties are all optional.
description.jp: A configuration object with errorMessage, decimalSeparator and thousandsSeparator. Those properties are all optional.

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when editor lost focus.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when editor lost focus.

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when value in editor was changed.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when value in editor was changed.

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when form gets onsubmit event.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when form gets onsubmit event.

description.en:
Option to show a label indication next to optional fields.
    Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.
description.jp:
Option to show a label indication next to optional fields.
    Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.

description.en: Gets or sets regular expression which is used to validate value in text editor.
description.jp: Gets or sets regular expression which is used to validate value in text editor.

description.en: A string containing regular expression
description.jp: A string containing regular expression

description.en: A RegExp object or an object with expression and errorMessage properties.
description.jp: A RegExp object or an object with expression and errorMessage properties.

description.en: Gets or sets option to validate if value was entered (not empty text, selected item, etc.)
description.jp: Gets or sets option to validate if value was entered (not empty text, selected item, etc.)

description.en: A boolean value indicating if the field is required.
description.jp: A boolean value indicating if the field is required.

description.en: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. required: { errorMessage: "Error!"} )
description.jp: A configuration object with optional error message (e.g. required: { errorMessage: "Error!"} )

description.en:
Option to show an asterisks indication next to required fields.
    Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.
description.jp:
Option to show an asterisks indication next to required fields.
    Note: Indicators are not supported on grouped controls such as checkbox or radio button sets and the igRating control.

description.en: Gets or sets text for success message. Note there is no default, so setting this message will enable showing success indications.
description.jp: Gets or sets text for success message. Note there is no default, so setting this message will enable showing success indications.

description.en:
Gets or sets validation minimum input length. Validation won't be triggered for input before that value is reached on change and blur.
Note: This will have no effect on required fields on form submit.
description.jp:
Gets or sets validation minimum input length. Validation won't be triggered for input before that value is reached on change and blur.
Note: This will have no effect on required fields on form submit.

description.en: Gets or sets minimum and maximum values. Null values are ignored.
description.jp: Gets or sets minimum and maximum values. Null values are ignored.

description.en: An array of two numbers or dates, where the first is the minimum and the second is the maximum. (e.g. valueRange: [ 1, 10] )
description.jp: An array of two numbers or dates, where the first is the minimum and the second is the maximum. (e.g. valueRange: [ 1, 10] )

description.en: A configuration object with optional error message. Message strings can contain format items for min and max respecitively (e.g. lengthRange: { min: 6, max: 20, errorMessage: "Value must be between {0} and {1}." } )
description.jp: A configuration object with optional error message. Message strings can contain format items for min and max respecitively (e.g. lengthRange: { min: 6, max: 20, errorMessage: "Value must be between {0} and {1}." } )
